name: One Bullet (Real Games)
description:
Try to find out what's going on here...This game was create for Weekly Game Jam 149 - Last One Left

WHERE YOU CAN SUPORT ME?

You can support me with subscribe on my YouTube chanel, or with follow on my Twitter, or you can visit my websites. You can donate me too!

CONTROLS
  • A, D - move left and right
  • SPACE - jump
  • E - Pick up gun and throw gun
  • LEFT CLICK - shoot bullet or shoot rope
HOW TO DOWNLOAD
  • Download .zip file
  • Place in a folder on you desktop
  • Right click > Extract Here
  • Double click on OneBullet.exe
